title: [文宣] 唔好再圍爐！#describehkpolice tweet 向全世界！！！

replies.msg:
抗戰黎到呢度，
除左迫政府正面回應，更加係時候面向國際！
fb ig 出posts 雖可取，
但未免都係圍爐取暖打飛機！
所以我地要 SOS to the world!!!!

我地不如喺 Twitter 搞個香港人campaign!
#describehkpolice
用呢個 hashtag，同全世界推廣香港班仆街popo!
寫得正面啲！因為我地經歷緊白色恐怖！

例子如下：

How do you describe #hkpolice?
You need to be positive.

1.They won't hit and arrest people randomly by mood.
2. You may be severely injured, please wait for 2.5+ hr before you can go to hospital.
3. You can recognize their identities by their pass. Only that they found no place to show it on their uniforms.
4. In police station, you can be accompanied by your legal representative, only after you finished the statement.
5. After arrested, female "suspect" has to be undressed and frisked by policewoman, but door keep opened and 10+ policmen watching.

#describehkpolice #praise #ironic
#hongkong #hk #hkprotest #soshk #fightforfreedom #standwithhk #freedom #democracy #democracyforhk #antiextraditionlaw #antielab #pray #travel #tourism #travelgram #photography #photo #journalist #news #sunday #usa #uk #canada #germany #japan #korea #australia #helphk #香港 #hke
hashtag 隨便加，越 common 越好

我都係新手唔識用 Twitter!
我知我英文廢！
我知有人驚錯字錯 grammar 驚1999!
但因為呢啲原因而唔幫香港發聲，
點對得住前線班手足！
開工喇兄弟！

明白大家呢排嘅士氣經過831恐襲同901大撤退之後好低落
我同大家一樣都係
但越係呢啲時候
我地就越要堅持下去，團結一致
唔好比林鄭見我地冇士氣而去捉多啲人
